name: BLOCKADE 3D
description: BLOCKADE 3D! First Person Shooter in an editable procedural cubic world. A large arsenal of weapons, 4 teams at the same time and up to 32 players on one map. A large number of game modes!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7,8.1,10 Processor: Pentium 4 2000MHz Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: GeForce GT520 DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 700 MB available space Sound Card: any
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7,8.1,10 Processor: Core i5 Memory: 4096 MB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050Ti DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 700 MB available space Sound Card: any
